::Lord Elder::

Elder thinks it over as should Razorwing. Was Jotunn right with his strike first ideals?

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Deadfur: Right! Medics, we have a break, so move out and get me the
 most damaged out of the field. After that, Repair the minor damages in
 case we have a second go at it.
 
 *****
 
 Jotunn: You could try to arrest me, Razorwing, but you know as much as
 I do that such an action would be foolish at best from your part. My
 followers hold the most advanced military facility on this planet and
 you have one of my most reckless warriors right near your homebase. If
 I'm not there to keep him in check, there's no telling how much damage
 he could do.
 
 Up in the air, the five Airtankers smiled evilly.
 
 Jotunn: Besides, I have a more convenient suggestion. I want to
 destroy the Minions at all cost. With all due respect, Lord Elder, I
 will not sit around and wait for them to drop by and say hi. I want to
 slay them to the last so we can live in peace afterwards. However, I
 cannot do that with the current power structure. Do you agree to this
 point, Maximal?
